A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing to learn that this trilogy was planned as three seperate movies with creative license given to separate writers/directors. As a longtime fan\, I hoped for the fulfillment of the nine-movie arc that Lucas plotted. I'm much less interested in Disney's plan to expand the Star Wars universe. I can live with porgs\, and I'm totally happy with the diverse cast\, but I don't like the way Johnson was allowed to subvert what was teased or that the only endgame is to move onto a fourth and fifth trilogy to milk a cash cow.
